summary: REQ-1 is partially implemented: the college name was added to the first paragraph of AboutSection, and it appears in HeroSection, but in HeroSection it is placed as a separate line below the subtitle rather than being included in the subtitle line itself as requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include the college name in the Hero section subtitle line under the name (not as a separate additional line), keeping existing styling/animations intact.
missing_requirements.reason:
In the diff, HeroSection keeps the subtitle text as "Computer Engineering Student | AI & Robotics Enthusiast" and renders the college name in a separate

below it, which does not match the requirement to include it in the subtitle line.
